post.content:

Our Markham-based client, a growing online company of 600 employees, is looking for an Intermediate Java Developer:

* Knowledge and experience of Struts, REST, SOA, or API development a must
* Intermediate level of Java development (3-5yrs)
* Knowledge and experience with Ruby on Rails an asset, but not necessary
Location:         Canada-ON-Markham
Telecommute:         No (Onsite Position)
Contact Name:         Jay de Dios, Sr Account Mgr
Contact Phone:        
Contact Email:         jay.dedios@hireglyphics.com
URL:        http://network.hireglyphics.com
